review: How do I have this many hours already!?Anyway... This was a Kickstarter game that is run by a team of 12-people who made the Galaxy on Fire series, and it easily does all the following...Beats Elite: Dangerous in finding things to shoot.Was announced after Star Citizen, but is now releasing before Star Citizen is.Better enviroments and scenery than EVE Online.Higher replay value than FTL.TL;DRIt's a spiritual successor to Freelancer, the Dark Souls of space games, and a better use of your money than No Man's Sky vaporware.
